intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: BNOS Business OS respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we handle your information when you use our point-of-sale application.

dataCollection.title: Data We Collect
dataCollection.content: BNOS Business OS is designed with privacy-first principles. We collect minimal data necessary for the application to function:
dataCollection.item1: Business information you enter (shop name, address, products, etc.)
dataCollection.item2: Transaction records for your business operations
dataCollection.item3: Nostr public keys for data synchronization (optional)

localStorage.title: Local Data Storage
localStorage.content: All your business data is stored locally on your device using IndexedDB (Dexie.js). This means your data stays on your device and under your control. We do not have access to your local data.

nostr.title: Nostr Protocol
nostr.content: If you choose to enable Nostr synchronization, your data is encrypted and published to Nostr relays. You control which relays to use and can manage your data through the Nostr protocol. Your private key never leaves your device.

encryption.title: Data Encryption
encryption.content: All sensitive data synchronized via Nostr is encrypted using NIP-04/NIP-44 encryption standards. Only you (with your private key) can decrypt and access your data.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: BNOS Business OS may integrate with third-party services such as Lightning wallet providers (LNbits, Alby, NWC) and image hosting (Cloudinary). These services have their own privacy policies. We only share data necessary for the integration to function.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have complete control over your data:
rights.item1: Access and export your data at any time
rights.item2: Delete your data from local storage
rights.item3: Choose not to use cloud synchronization

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through our Nostr public key or GitHub repository.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using bnos.space, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and conditions of this agreement. If you do not agree to these terms, you should not use this software.

license.title: License
license.content: bnos.space is open-source software licensed under the MIT License. You are free to use, modify, and distribute the software in accordance with the license terms.

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.content: When using bnos.space, you agree to:
userResponsibilities.item1: Keep your Nostr private keys secure and confidential
userResponsibilities.item2: Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
userResponsibilities.item3: Not use the service for illegal activities

payments.title: Payments & Lightning
payments.content: bnos.space integrates with the Lightning Network for payments. You are responsible for properly configuring your Lightning wallet and ensuring compliance with local financial regulations. We are not responsible for any payment processing errors or losses.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: bnos.space is provided "as is" without warranty of any kind. We do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free. You use this software at your own risk.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: In no event shall BitSpace or its contributors be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, or other intangible losses.

modifications.title: Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting. Your continued use of bnos.space after any changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through our official channels on GitHub or Nostr.
